metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8473 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The Issues API in Redmine before 2.6.8, 3.0.x before 3.0.6, and 3.1.x before 3.1.2 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information in changeset messages by leveraging permission to read issues with related changesets from other projects.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8473` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

redmine - 3.2.0-1
redmine-mysql - 3.2.0-1
redmine-pgsql - 3.2.0-1
redmine-sqlite - 3.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redmine package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.0-1').
